sentence.Network_en: The sanctity power, lavation my soul, administer the serenity to me! ―― spiritualization!
sentence.Network_cn: 圣洁的力量, 洗涤我的灵魂, 给我以宁静! ――净化术!

sentence.Network_en: Such tendencies can be modified only by advancing civilization and by gradual spiritualization.
sentence.Network_cn: 如此的趋向能被高级文明和精神净化逐渐修正.

sentence.Network_en: He has enriched the treasure of Chinese paintings with his visual metaphor, impersonality and spiritualization.
sentence.Network_cn: 他创造的视觉隐喻, 他的个人化、心灵化的绘画形象,为中国画的发展提供了宝贵的经验.
